summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1277, for the improvement of the alley in block 48, Sarah A. Bell's 2nd Addition to the City of Seattle, being the alley between Pike Street and Pine Street and Boren Avenue and Minor Avenue, by grading the same in conformity with the existing grade of Pike Street and the grade of Pine Street, as established by Ordinance No. 13587 under Ordinance No. 13969 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
